#include <stdio.h>
long long arr[1000002];
int main()
{
    long long t, i, j, k, n, m, ans;
    
    scanf("%lld", &t);
    while (t--) {
          scanf("%lld", &n);
          ans = 0;
          for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
              scanf("%lld", &arr[i]);
              ans += arr[i];
          }
          long long min_end_here = 0, min;
          min = 100000;
          for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
              min_end_here += arr[i];
              if (min_end_here >= 0) {
                 min_end_here = 0;
              }
              if (min > min_end_here) {
                    min = min_end_here;
              }
          }
          ans -= (2*min);
          printf("%lld\n", ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
